Title: Sunrise
Writer: Carl Mayer (scenario), Hermann Sudermann (from an original theme by), Katherine Hilliker (titles), H.H. Caldwell (titles)
Actors: George O'Brien, Janet Gaynor, Margaret Livingston, Bodil Rosing
Plot: In this fable-morality subtitled "A Song of Two Humans", the "evil" temptress is a city woman who bewitches farmer Anses and tries to convince him to murder his neglected wife, Indre.
